channel.title: Improv on Dan's Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Improv on Dan's Ramblings

item.title: Why I Love Doing Improv Comedy
item.description: A few months ago a friend of mine mentioned that he was taking an improv comedy class and was enjoying it more than he expected to. Looking at my quarantine-stricken calendar, I figured “what the fuck, might as well try it too”. Internally, this represented a leap of faith for me as a prior version of myself would ridicule “theater kids”, “band kids”, “art kids”, or any other kind of kid brave enough to express themself in front of others.
